name: Tools Clicker
description:
TOOLS CLICKER by lordquerix

Tools Clicker what is this?:
-Tools Clicker is normal clicker but its very big and has a lot of options!
You can dig blocks in mine! or you can trade with villagers in village!(not yet)

Is the game over?:
-No game are in development!

You will done this game?:
-Yes

Can i donate?:
-No because i use Minecraft graphic xd

Can i download game?:
-Yes but remember, game are in development!

How many days will the updates be?:
-I will update the game every Sunday
